website_summaries.verdict: While not as powerful as other models, these tweeters still push out a high quality sound and look great.
pros: Come with crossover networks, wires, and mounting pods
Smooth and balanced sound, with great high response
Metal mounting ring makes installation a breeze
cons: The 25 watts is lower than similarly priced high-quality models

customer_reviews.title: They are large
customer_reviews.text: Sound amazing for the price quality is top notch !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for car audio people!
customer_reviews.text: fresh clean rich highs and such a desirable design with the aluminum CNC cut goodness along with the supplied x over makes these set of tweeters practically perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Akuma

customer_reviews.title: Greatly complimented my car.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was good. Installation looks great and exactly fit existing factory holes.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W.

customer_reviews.title: CT sounds does a fantastic job with their products
customer_reviews.text: These things screem! CT sounds does a fantastic job with their products
customer_reviews.author: todd dooley

customer_reviews.title: but they sound pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to fit in the gauge holes on my harley street glide. They done fit, but they sound pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Rick F.

customer_reviews.title: They sound great! I was surprised the response of the highs
customer_reviews.text: They sound great! I was surprised the response of the highs. Excellent pair of tweeters. I will recommend to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only 25wrms power handling ...
customer_reviews.text: FY I ... These are only rated at 25watts RMS power handling from CT sounds ... The 50wrms they are advertising here is for the PAIR. Very misleading information.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Efaw #BOOMINBURBAN

customer_reviews.title: Great tweeters
customer_reviews.text: Very crisp sound. Adds a much larger soundspace to my music. Would recommend anyone who is needing tweeters to try these out. It may be too sharp for some people depending on equalization
customer_reviews.author: kyle olson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding tweeters! Smooth, balanced, not too bright at all. Work great with my 13 band parametric eq.
customer_reviews.author: The Fire Nurse

customer_reviews.title: waterproof so far
customer_reviews.text: Mounted on pontoon with about 80 clean watts sounds great, also been thru 4 rain storms soak n wet still sound like the day they were bought. will buy more for my car soon.
customer_reviews.author: JenRob2006

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and chrisp! I would definitely recommend this. I'm gonna order another set
customer_reviews.author: acuralex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Sound pretty damn good
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in the doors of my truck. I was pretty impressed how good they sound when added to a 50w pre-amped stereo. I actually ordered a second set for the back since these worked out so well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell S.

customer_reviews.title: Best highs for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great tweeters. Clean crisp high notes, and sound great even at high volume
customer_reviews.author: mauichevyracer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: These tweeters are awesome. They look awesome and they are built well. They are all metal housing for the tweeter and they really make up the top end of your audio spectrum. They will perform great off of deck power. Having the metal ring that screws on back makes mounting these easy anywhere in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CT SOUNDS 1 Inch Silk Dome Tweeters– 4 Ohm Impedance, 100W Maximum Power Capacity, Flush Mount Ring, Voice Coil Suspended in Ferro Fluid - Meso 25mm Tweeters
feature_bullets: CT Sounds Meso 25mm Flush Mount Silk Dome Tweeters (Pair); Total Power: 50W (RMS) | 100W (MAX)
25mm Silk Dome & Flush Mount Top Quality Tweeters, Aluminium Housing for Tweeters
Voice Coil Suspended in FerroFluid; Quality Aluminium Tweeter Frame & N38H Neodymium Magnet
Comes with Crossover Box with Connected Wires; Laser Cut Logo Print on Tweeter Outer Frame
